trans-unit.source: Represents a security token handler that creates security tokens from SAML 2.0 Assertions.
trans-unit.target: 表示建立安全性權杖的 SAML 2.0 判斷提示的安全性權杖處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The Saml2SecurityTokenHandler class serializes and deserializes security tokens backed by SAML 2.0 Assertions into <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken> objects.
trans-unit.target: Saml2SecurityTokenHandler 類別序列化和還原序列化安全性權杖的 SAML 2.0 判斷提示到<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken>物件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Security token handlers are responsible for creating, reading, writing, and validating tokens.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖處理常式負責建立、 讀取、 寫入和驗證權杖。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a security token service (STS) or relying party (RP) application to process SAML 2.0 Assertion-backed security tokens by adding an instance of the Saml2SecurityTokenHandler class to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection> object configured for the service (or application).
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定安全性權杖服務 (STS) 或信賴憑證者 (RP) 應用程式處理 SAML 2.0 判斷提示為基礎的安全性權杖加入至 Saml2SecurityTokenHandler 類別的執行個體<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection>設定服務 （或應用程式） 的物件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection>

trans-unit.source: This can be done either programmatically or in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這可以透過程式設計方式或在組態檔中完成。

trans-unit.source: The handler itself is configured from the configuration specified for the collection through the collection’s <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection.Configuration%2A> property when it is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合的集合針對指定的設定會設定處理常式本身<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection.Configuration%2A>屬性加入至集合時。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection.Configuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: While it is possible to configure the handler individually by setting its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property, this is not normally necessary; however, if the handler must be configured individually, the property should be set after the handler is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以藉由設定個別設定的處理常式其<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>屬性，這不是通常需要; 不過，如果處理常式必須在個別的設定，屬性應設定之後，處理常式加入至集合。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: For many scenarios, the Saml2SecurityTokenHandler class can be used as-is; however, the class provides many extension points through the methods it exposes.
trans-unit.target: 以許多情形來說 Saml2SecurityTokenHandler 類別可用來當作-;不過，這個類別會提供許多擴充點透過方法它公開。

trans-unit.source: By deriving from the Saml2SecurityTokenHandler and overriding specific methods, you can modify the functionality of the token processing provided in the default implementation, or you can add processing for extensions to the SAML Assertion specification that may be needed in some custom scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 藉由衍生自 Saml2SecurityTokenHandler 並覆寫特定方法，您可以修改的預設實作中，在提供的權杖處理功能，或加入可能需要在某些案例中自訂的 SAML 判斷提示規格的延伸模組的處理。

trans-unit.source: Creates the conditions for the assertion.
Generally, conditions should be included in assertions to limit the impact of misuse of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，條件應該包含在限制的誤用，判斷提示之影響的判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions can limit the period of vulnerability in the case of a compromised assertion.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件可以限制的弱點可能會在受到危害的判斷提示的情況下的期間。

trans-unit.source: The AudienceRestrictionCondition can be used to explicitly state the intended relying party or parties of the assertion, which coupled with appropriate audience restriction enforcement at relying parties can help to mitigate spoofing attacks between relying parties.
trans-unit.target: AudienceRestrictionCondition 可用來明確指定預定的信賴憑證者合作對象，或判斷提示，搭配適當的對象限制強制在信賴憑證者的合作對象之合作對象可以幫助減輕信賴憑證者的合作對象之間的詐騙攻擊。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A> property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會建立為基礎的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A>屬性`tokenDescriptor`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: It will also generate an AudienceRestrictionCondition limiting consumption of the assertion to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A> property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
trans-unit.target: 它也會產生限制的判斷提示來取用 AudienceRestrictionCondition<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A>屬性`tokenDescriptor`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A>

trans-unit.source: The address is modeled as an AudienceRestriction condition.
